doc.title: Abilene
doc.plot: Irving, a reclusive trucker, meets pretty but infantile Abilene at a transient motel in small-town Texas. He falls in love only to find out she's a gasoline-huffing hooker and that her heart belongs to another. Undaunted, Irving asks her to marry him and they settle down in a cozy little mobile home where all is well, for a while, until a stranger rolls into town...
